name: CorgiStack
description:
A Simple yet sweet game about corgis! With charming visuals &  peaceful gameplay get hooked & stack some corgis!  This physics-based puzzle stacking game has players give it their all to build a glorious tower of corgis and try to see how far up they can get!

  • Stacker 
  • Physics-based gameplay
  • Different corgis to stack!
  • Score counters (try to get a high score!)
